EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Networking Reception (1314728329.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Networking Reception (1314728329.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Kami,
Sorry we missed you! We hope you can make the next one, we seem to have them every quarter or so. Good luck on the contract being approved and hope to hear from you soon.
Regards,
Steve ___________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: kgroom@comcast.net [mailto:kgroom@comcast.net] Sent: Friday, August 26, 2011 10:33 AM To: Marcelle Saab Cc: Nicolette Taylor; Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Networking Reception
All,
I just got this message today. I am upset that I missed the event. I will be contact MBO Partners as soon as I hear that the contract that I have been waiting for has been approved.
Thanks.
Kami From: "Marcelle Saab" <msaab@mbopartners.com> To: kgroom@comcast.net Cc: "Nicolette Taylor" <ntaylor@mbopartners.com>, "Steve Arhancet" <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> Sent: Thursday, August 25, 2011 3:35:38 PM Subject: MBO Networking Reception Hello Kami,
Steve Arhancet passed along your information, and I wanted to take this opportunity to follow up with you about the MBO Networking Cocktail Reception tonight at Mon Ami Gabi in Reston. This will be a great opportunity for you to meet MBO Consultants, MBO Clients, as well as some of the MBO Internal staff.
Please click on the link below for more information, and let me know if you will be able to attend  wed love to have you!
http://mbosummer2011reception.eventbrite.com
I have CCd Nicolette Taylor, who works with Steve on the Direct Enrollment team, who will be at the event tonight. We will make sure to keep an eye out for you!
Best,
___________________________________ Marcelle Saab Program Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6006 f: 703.793.6084 e: msaab@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
